name: SpaceRPG Demo
description:
Don't forget to download the  .pck file and place it in the same folder as the .exe! 

WSAD to move 

Left-click to shoot

Mouse to aim

This is a prototype and very much a rough demo for my 30 Day game dev challenge, I will update this page with newer versions as time goes on! Come watch the development live at twitch.tv/tragicbean I'll be working on the project every day till the 30th!
